lead_paragraph: LEVY--Jacqueline. Died at home July 17, 2016. Sister of the late Edith Segal and the late Dr. William Levy. Loved and loving aunt of Jane Levy, Elizabeth Williamson, Margaret Levy, Susan Rai, and Paul Segal. Generous and life-loving, she will be missed by her relatives and her many, many close, caring friends and neighbors. Services Wednesday, July 20 at 4:00pm at Riverside Chapels, Amsterdam Ave. and West 76th St., followed immediately by shiva from 6:00 to 8:00pm at 285 Central Park West, Apt. 8W. 1/3
